title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a lightweight, extensible framework.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models with simple synchronous & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps ollama with extra helpers for batch prompts, templates and config files.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, model management and streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic Ruby interface to chat, generate and manage local models.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example consuming Ollama via the ollama-js client, useful as a starter template.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama with async support, targeting .NET Standard 2.0+.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and example compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server plus optional web UI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing ergonomic wrappers over the Ollama REST API with Tokio/async support.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-kotlin-sdk
summary: Community Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama supporting JVM, Android and native targets.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented-generation demo using Ollama for generation and sentence-transformers for embeddings.

title: ollama-dify-integration
summary: Dify now supports Ollama as a local model provider for chat, completions and embeddings within the Dify platform.
